AUTHOR: Pwnulatr
INSTALL_MSG: Successfully installed the cog./nuse `[p]help` to see the commands for conversion
NAME: Converter
SHORT: Converts units of stuff. Currently supports Temperature and Speed. DOES NOT SUPPORT DECIMALS YET.
DESCRIPTION: Converts different units of measurement. Currently does not support decimal points. /nTemperature /nSpeed /nLength (Partially)
